meta_description.title: Ninja Gaiden (2004 video game) - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Ninja Gaiden is a 2004 hack and slash game developed by Team Ninja and published by Tecmo for the Xbox. Players control Ryu Hayabusa, a master ninja, ...Release: March 2, 2004Director(s): Tomonobu ItagakiComposer(s): Ryo Koike; Wakana Hara; Makoto ...Developer(s): Team Ninja

people_also_ask.heading: Ninja Gaiden is and will always be one of the hardest video game franchises in video game history. The hardest game, without a doubt, is Ninja Gaiden Black on the original Xbox. This particular game was so hard that many players pleaded for an easier difficulty to be released.14-Dec-2017
people_also_ask.title: 5 of the Hardest Games of All Time | Joyscribe

people_also_ask.heading: Most would agree that Ninja Gaiden III is the hardest.29-Oct-2018
people_also_ask.title: Ranking the NES Ninja Gaiden trilogy according to difficulty

people_also_ask.heading: After the release of the 2004 Xbox title Ninja Gaiden, the Ninja Gaiden series was revamped and the original games were made redundant in the story. With Ayane being fourteen-years-old in the game, Ninja Gaiden takes place two years before the original Dead or Alive.
people_also_ask.title: Canon timeline | Dead or Alive Wiki

people_also_ask.heading: Team Ninja considers the series one of its signature franchises, despite its 2004 Ninja Gaiden technically being a reboot of Tecmo's already popular NES property.04-Apr-2021

knowledge_panel.description: ninja gaiden is a series of action video games by tecmo featuring the ninja ryu hayabusa as its protagonist. the series was originally known as ninja ryukenden in japan. the word "gaiden" in the north american ninja gaiden title means “side story” in japanese. wikipedia
